participant_1.background:
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.
my hair is very long.
I sometimes drink too much wine when I go on wine tours.
i love hiking and staying fit.

participant_2.background:
I practice music and do some meditation to calm my nerves before my first day of safety patrol.
My relationship is going strong, even though my family doesn't approve.
I'm always on the lookout for new and exciting ways to challenge myself, both physically and mentally.
I'm not much of a fashion plate but I love my moped and my pickled eggs.
My first purchase was a Game of Thrones book, which I hid in my room so my parents wouldn't find it.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Not bad, not bad. Trying to keep my nerves at bay before my first day of safety patrol.
Oh yeah, I bet that's exciting! What are you most looking forward to?
I'm excited to meet new people and learn more about the job. I'm also a little nervous, but I'm sure I'll do great.
I'm sure you will too! You seem like a really capable person.
Thanks, that means a lot. I'm trying to be the best I can be.
That's awesome. I'm sure you'll go far in life.
No problem! So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play music. I also like to hike and stay fit.
Oh cool, I love to hike too! Where are some of your favorite places to hike?
I love hiking in the mountains. I live in a pretty mountainous area, so I'm lucky to have a lot of great hiking trails nearby.
That sounds awesome! I'm jealous. I live in a pretty flat area, so there's not much hiking to be done.
You should come visit sometime! I'd be happy to show you around.
I would love that! Thanks for the offer.
